disp-quote.p: "Interprofessional versus monoprofessional case-based learning in childhood cancer and the effect on healthcare professionals' interprofessional attitudes and knowledge: study protocol for a randomised controlled trial”.
"Interprofessional case-based learning improves healthcare professionals' interprofessional attitudes in childhood cancer: a randomised controlled trial”.
"Intra-professional interactions: findings from interprofessional case-based learning in childhood cancer”.
